no_result_search_input: Could not find any results for "{{ searchInput }}"

homepage.bigbluebutton_description: BigBlueButton is an open source web conferencing system for online classes. The platform maximizes time for applied learning by enabling students to collaborate and receive feedback in real-time.
homepage.greenlight_description: Create your own rooms to host sessions, or join others using a short and convenient link.
homepage.meeting_description: Launch a virtual class with video, audio, screen sharing, chat, and all the tools required for applied learning.
homepage.recording_description: Record the BigBlueButton meetings and share them with the students to review and reflect on the material.
homepage.settings_description: Configure your rooms and meeting settings to be in charge of an effective classroom.
homepage.and_more_description: BigBlueButton offers built-in tools for applied learning and is designed to save you time during class.
homepage.enter_meeting_url: Please enter the URL of your BigBlueButton meeting in the field below.

user.name: Name
user.type_three_characters: Please type three (3) characters or more to show the other users.

account.delete_account_description:
If you choose to delete your account, it will NOT be recoverable. 
 All information regarding your account, including settings, rooms, and recordings will be removed.
account.delete_account_confirmation: Yes, I would like to delete my account
account.are_you_sure_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

pending.title: Pending Registration
pending.message: Thank you for registering! Your account is currently pending approval by an administrator.

room.rooms_list_is_empty: You don't have any rooms yet!
room.rooms_list_empty_create_room: Create your first room by clicking on the button below and entering a room name.

meeting.meeting_invitation: You have been invited to join
meeting.meeting_not_started: The meeting has not started yet
meeting.join_meeting_automatically: You will automatically join when the meeting starts
meeting.recording_consent: I acknowledge that this session may be recorded. This may include my voice and video if enabled.

presentation.upload_description: Upload any office document or PDF file. Depending on the size of the file, it may require additional time to upload before it can be used
presentation.are_you_sure_delete_presentation: Are you sure you want to delete this presentation?

shared_access.add_some_users_description: To add new users, click the button below and search or select the users you want to share this room with.

settings.require_signed_in: Require users to be signed in before joining
settings.require_signed_in_message: You must be signed in to join this room.
settings.allow_any_user_to_start: Allow any user to start this meeting
settings.are_you_sure_delete_room: Are you sure you want to delete this room?

recording.name: Name
recording.recordings_list_empty: You don't have any recordings yet!
recording.recordings_list_empty_description: Recordings will appear here after you start a meeting and record it.
recording.are_you_sure_delete_recording: Are you sure you want to delete this recording?

manage_users.are_you_sure_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete {{user.name}}'s account?
manage_users.delete_account_warning: If you choose to delete this account, it will NOT be recoverable.
manage_users.empty_active_users: There are no active users on this server yet!
manage_users.empty_active_users_subtext: When a user's status gets changed to active, they will appear here.
manage_users.empty_pending_users: There are no pending users on this server yet!
manage_users.empty_pending_users_subtext: When a user's status gets changed to pending, they will appear here.
manage_users.empty_banned_users: There are no banned users on this server yet!
manage_users.empty_banned_users_subtext: When a user's status gets changed to banned, they will appear here.
manage_users.empty_invited_users: There are no invited users on this server yet!
manage_users.empty_invited_users_subtext: When a user's status gets changed to invited, they will appear here.

server_rooms.name: Name
server_rooms.empty_room_list: There are no server rooms yet!
server_rooms.empty_room_list_subtext: Rooms will appear here after creating your first room.

appearance.upload_brand_image_description: Upload any PNG, JPG, or SVG file. Depending on the size of the file, it may require additional time to upload before it can be used

administration.change_term_links: Change the terms links that appears at the bottom of the page
administration.change_privacy_link: Change the privacy link that appears at the bottom of the page

settings.allow_users_to_share_rooms_description: Setting to disabled will remove the button from the room options dropdown, preventing users from sharing rooms
settings.allow_users_to_preupload_presentation_de: Users can preupload a presentation to be used as the default presentation for that specific room

registration.role_mapping_by_email_description: Map the user to a role using their email. Must be in the format: role1=email1, role2=email2
registration.resync_on_login: Resync User Data On Every Sign In
registration.resync_on_login_description: Resync a user's information every time they sign in, making the external authentication provider always match the information in Greenlight
registration.default_role_description: The default role to be assigned to newly created users
registration.registration_method_description: Change the way that users register to the website

configurations.allow_room_to_be_recorded_description: Allows room owners to specify whether they want the option to record a room or not. If enabled, the moderator must still click the 'Record' button once the meeting has started.
configurations.require_user_signed_in: Require users to be signed in before joining
configurations.require_user_signed_in_description: Only allows users with a Greenlight account to join the meeting. If they are not signed in, they will be redirected to the login page when attempting to join a room.
configurations.require_mod_approval_description: Prompts the moderator of the BigBlueButton meeting when a user tries to join. If the user is approved, they will be able to join the meeting.
configurations.allow_any_user_to_start_meeting: Allow any user to start a meeting
configurations.allow_any_user_to_start_meeting_descript: Allow any user to start the meeting at any time. By default, only the room owner can start the meeting.
configurations.allow_users_to_join_as_mods_description: Gives all users the moderator privileges in BigBlueButton when they join the meeting
configurations.mute_users_on_join_description: Automatically mutes the user when they join the BigBlueButton meeting
configurations.viewer_access_code_description: Allows room owners to have a random alphanumeric code that can be shared with users. The code, if generated, will be required for users to join the room meetings.
configurations.mod_access_code_description: Allows room owners to have a random alphanumeric code that can be shared with users. The code, if generated, will not be required and when used on any room meeting will join the user as a moderator.

roles.are_you_sure_delete_role: Are you sure you want to delete this role?

edit.create_room: Allow users with this role to create rooms
edit.record: Allow users with this role to record their meetings
edit.manage_users: Allow users with this role to manage users
edit.manage_rooms: Allow users with this role to manage server rooms
edit.manage_recordings: Allow users with this role to manage server recordings
edit.manage_site_settings: Allow users with this role to manage site settings
edit.manage_roles: Allow users with this role to edit other roles
edit.shared_list: Include users with this role in the dropdown for sharing rooms

There was a problem completing that action.

error.signin_required: You must be signed in to access this page

roles.role_assigned: This role can't be deleted as it is assigned to at least one user.

users.signup_error: There was an error signing you in. Please contact your administrator.
users.invalid_invite: Your invitation token is either invalid or incorrect. Please contact your administrator to receive a new one
users.email_exists: An account under this email already exists. Please try again with another email
users.old_password: The current password you have entered is incorrect
users.pending: Your registration is pending approval from your administrator
users.banned: You do not have access to this application. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is a mistake

rooms.room_limit: Room can not be created due to room limit being reached

session.invalid_credentials: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.

global_error_page.title: Error
global_error_page.message: Oops! Something went wrong. If the incident occurs again, please contact the administrator.

not_found_error_page.message: Oops! The page you are trying to access can't be found.

account_activation_page.title: Account Activation
account_activation_page.account_unverified: Your account has not been verified yet.
account_activation_page.message: In order to use Greenlight, please verify your account by following the instructions in the activation email that was sent to you.
account_activation_page.resend_activation_link: If you haven't received an activation email or if you are having a problem using it, click the resend button below to request a new activation email.

emails.required: Please enter at least one valid email
emails.list: Please provide a comma separated list of valid emails (user@users.com,user1@users.com,user2@users.com)

limit.required: Please enter the room count limit
